dkSTS:RuneOfAnnihilation.NAME: Rune of Annihilation
dkSTS:RuneOfAnnihilation.DESCRIPTION: dksts:Hex: Target loses !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

dkSTS:BreachingBlast.NAME: Breaching Blast
dkSTS:BreachingBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the target has dksts:Chill, deal !M! times the damage.

dkSTS:AssassinsBlade.NAME: Assassin's Blade
dkSTS:AssassinsBlade.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

dkSTS:ConsumeVitality.NAME: Consume Vitality
dkSTS:ConsumeVitality.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If Fatal, dksts:Drain !H! HP and enter dksts:Bloodlust. NL Exhaust.

dkSTS:CloudOfDarkness.NAME: Cloud of Darkness
dkSTS:CloudOfDarkness.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Your next Attack deals !M! additional damage.

dkSTS:SwarmOfBats.NAME: Swarm of Bats
dkSTS:SwarmOfBats.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Gain 1 dksts:Hunger for each Enemy.

dkSTS:HungerStatus.NAME: Starving
dkSTS:HungerStatus.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Ethereal. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! dksts:Hunger.

dkSTS:FeralLeap.NAME: Feral Leap
dkSTS:FeralLeap.DESCRIPTION: dksts:Wild. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! dksts:Hunger.

dkSTS:CrownOfIce.NAME: Crown of Ice
dkSTS:CrownOfIce.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 1 dksts:Chill NL Gain !M! Thorns until you next take damage. NL Exhaust.
dkSTS:CrownOfIce.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Thorns until you next take damage. NL Exhaust.

dkSTS:ArchfeysWisdom.NAME: Archfey's Wisdom
dkSTS:ArchfeysWisdom.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each of your turns, gain [E] .

dkSTS:EnhanceAbility.NAME: Enhance Ability
dkSTS:EnhanceAbility.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Choose one: NL Gain 2 Strength, 2 Dexterity, 1 dksts:Vitality, or 1 dksts:Feral
dkSTS:EnhanceAbility.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose one: NL Gain 2 Strength, 2 Dexterity, 1 dksts:Vitality, or 1 dksts:Feral

dkSTS:SleetStorm.NAME: Sleet Storm
dkSTS:SleetStorm.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! dksts:Chill to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M2! dksts:Evasion NL Exhaust all *Burns from your hand.

dkSTS:QuickSnack.NAME: Quick Snack
dkSTS:QuickSnack.DESCRIPTION: Remove all your dksts:Hunger. NL Gain !M! dksts:Ward. NL Exhaust.

dkSTS:Desperation.NAME: Desperation
dkSTS:Desperation.DESCRIPTION: Your attacks deal extra damage equal to your dksts:Hunger.
dkSTS:Desperation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! dksts:Hunger. NL Your attacks deal extra damage equal to your dksts:Hunger.

dkSTS:Stalk.NAME: Stalk
dkSTS:Stalk.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Ethereal. NL Scry !M!. NL Draw !M2! cards. NL Exhaust.

dkSTS:GlyphOfShielding.NAME: Glyph Of Shielding
dkSTS:GlyphOfShielding.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block.

dkSTS:Metastasize.NAME: Metastasize
dkSTS:Metastasize.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! Max HP. NL Take an extra turn after this one. NL End your turn. NL Exhaust.

dkSTS:SecondChance.NAME: Second Chance
dkSTS:SecondChance.DESCRIPTION: dksts:Redraw !M!. Add a *Dazed to your Discard Pile.

dkSTS:Bloodstrike.NAME: Bloodstrike
dkSTS:Bloodstrike.DESCRIPTION: dksts:Wild. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Lose !M! HP.

dkSTS:VoidShout.NAME: Void Shout
dkSTS:VoidShout.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL dksts:Voidflux: Gain !M! dksts:Vitality.

dkSTS:PackMother.NAME: Pack Mother
dkSTS:PackMother.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! dksts:Wolves. NL dksts:Sic your *Wolves.

dkSTS:CallOfTheWild.NAME: Call of the Wild
dkSTS:CallOfTheWild.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! dksts:Wolf. NL dksts:Sic them twice. NL Reduce this card's cost by 1 this combat.

dkSTS:TwinnedGlyphs.NAME: Twinned Glyphs
dkSTS:TwinnedGlyphs.DESCRIPTION: The first card you play each turn which would give you a benefit next turn, gain it this turn, too.
dkSTS:TwinnedGlyphs.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first !M! cards you play each turn which would give you a benefit next turn, gain it this turn, too.

dkSTS:GlyphOfAlacrity.NAME: Glyph Of Alacrity
dkSTS:GlyphOfAlacrity.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Next turn, NL gain [E] [E] .
dkSTS:GlyphOfAlacrity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Next turn, NL gain [E] [E] [E] .

dkSTS:GlyphOfPossibility.NAME: Glyph of Possibility
dkSTS:GlyphOfPossibility.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Next turn, draw !M! cards.

dkSTS:GlyphOfVersatility.NAME: Glyph Of Versatility
dkSTS:GlyphOfVersatility.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Next turn, draw !M! card, gain !B! Block, NL and gain [E] . NL Exhaust.
dkSTS:GlyphOfVersatility.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Next turn, draw !M! cards, gain !B! Block, NL and gain [E] [E] . NL Exhaust.

dkSTS:IceBite.NAME: Ice Bite
dkSTS:IceBite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! dksts:Chill. NL dksts:Drain HP equal to half the target's dksts:Chill.
dkSTS:IceBite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! dksts:Chill. NL dksts:Drain HP equal to the target's dkSts:Chill.

dkSTS:BurstOfMist.NAME: Burst of Mist
dkSTS:BurstOfMist.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! dksts:Evasion. NL Discard !M! card.

dkSTS:MemoryOfBlood.NAME: Memory of Blood
dkSTS:MemoryOfBlood.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M2! HP. NL Gain !M! dksts:Hunger. NL Play !M3! random Attack from your Discard Pile.
dkSTS:MemoryOfBlood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose !M2! HP. NL Gain !M! dksts:Hunger. NL Play !M3! random Attacks from your Discard Pile.

dkSTS:ChaosMagic.NAME: Chaos Magic
dkSTS:ChaosMagic.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy three times. NL dksts:Flux: Play a random card from ANY class.
dkSTS:ChaosMagic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy three times. NL dksts:Flux: Play !M! random cards from ANY class.

dkSTS:NaturesAnarchy.NAME: Nature's Anarchy
dkSTS:NaturesAnarchy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! dksts:Wolves this turn only. NL dksts:Flux: dksts:Sic them !M3! times.

dkSTS:Redo.NAME: Redo
dkSTS:Redo.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL dksts:Redraw X. They cost 0 this turn. Exhaust. NL dksts:Flux: Don't Exhaust.
dkSTS:Redo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL dksts:Redraw X+1. They cost 0 this turn. Exhaust. NL dksts:Flux: Don't Exhaust.

dkSTS:Shatter.NAME: Shatter
dkSTS:Shatter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! extra damage for each stack of dksts:Chill it has. NL Remove its dksts:Chill

dkSTS:FavorableRewind.NAME: Favorable Rewind
dkSTS:FavorableRewind.DESCRIPTION: When you dksts:Redraw, you no longer draw Status or Curse cards.
dkSTS:FavorableRewind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL When you dksts:Redraw, you no longer draw Status or Curse cards.

dkSTS:DefensiveRestoration.NAME: Shield of Pain
dkSTS:DefensiveRestoration.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain !M! additional Block for each Status in your hand and Discard Pile.
dkSTS:DefensiveRestoration.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain !M! additional Block for each Status in your hand and Discard Pile and Exhaust them.

dkSTS:OffensiveRestoration.NAME: Offensive Restoration [DEP]
dkSTS:OffensiveRestoration.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies for each Status in your Discard Pile. NL Exhaust them. NL (Deal !D! damage)
dkSTS:OffensiveRestoration.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies for each Status in your hand and Discard Pile. NL Exhaust them. NL (Deal !D! damage)

dkSTS:Faint.NAME: Faint
dkSTS:Faint.DESCRIPTION: dksts:Redraw !M!. NL Lose !M3! HP. NL Add !M! *Dazed to your Discard Pile. NL Exhaust.

dkSTS:CuringWounds.NAME: Curing Wounds
dkSTS:CuringWounds.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Status card, Heal 1 HP.

dkSTS:Invisibility.NAME: Invisibility
dkSTS:Invisibility.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Enter dksts:Invisibility. NL Exhaust.
dkSTS:Invisibility.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Retain. NL Enter dksts:Invisibility. NL Exhaust.

dkSTS:ShadowStrike.NAME: Shadow Strike
dkSTS:ShadowStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you are dksts:Invisible, gain [E] [E] .

dkSTS:VanishingBite.NAME: Vanishing Bite
dkSTS:VanishingBite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL dksts:Drain !H! HP. NL dksts:Flux: Enter dksts:Invisibility.

dkSTS:Swipe.NAME: Swipe
dkSTS:Swipe.DESCRIPTION: dksts:Wild. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Your next Skill this turn costs 1 less.

dkSTS:Simplements.NAME: Simplements
dkSTS:Simplements.DESCRIPTION: Your Basic and Common Attacks deal !M! more damage.

dkSTS:Haste.NAME: Haste
dkSTS:Haste.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain [E] , draw 1 card, and shuffle !M! *Dazed into your Discard Pile.

dkSTS:LifeTransference.NAME: Life Transference
dkSTS:LifeTransference.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Gain !M3! Ward. NL Exhaust.

dkSTS:VitalSacrifice.NAME: Vital Sacrifice
dkSTS:VitalSacrifice.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M3! Strength. NL Gain !M! Vigor. Gain !M2! dksts:Vitality. NL Exhaust.

dkSTS:SaltAndSilver.NAME: Salt and Silver
dkSTS:SaltAndSilver.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vulnerable. NL Gain [E] [E] . NL Exhaust.
dkSTS:SaltAndSilver.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! Vulnerable. NL Gain [E] [E] . NL Exhaust.

dkSTS:BestialTransformation.NAME: Bestial Transformation
dkSTS:BestialTransformation.DESCRIPTION: Transform into a dksts:Dire_Wolf. NL Exhaust.

dkSTS:CrimsonRite.NAME: Crimson Rite
dkSTS:CrimsonRite.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP from a card, gain !M! Regen.

dkSTS:DreamEater.NAME: Dream Eater
dkSTS:DreamEater.DESCRIPTION: Choose an enemy. Whenever you play a card while this enemy does not intend to attack, they lose !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

dkSTS:FrenziedStrike.NAME: Frenzied Strike
dkSTS:FrenziedStrike.DESCRIPTION: dksts:Wild. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If dksts:Bloodied, deal !D! damage and Apply !M! Weak.

dkSTS:FirstHunt.NAME: First Hunt
dkSTS:FirstHunt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! dksts:Wolf. NL Add a *Second *Hunt to your Discard Pile. NL Exhaust.
dkSTS:FirstHunt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! dksts:Wolves. NL Add a *Second *Hunt+ to your Discard Pile. NL Exhaust.

dkSTS:SecondHunt.NAME: Second Hunt
dkSTS:SecondHunt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL dksts:Sic your dksts:Wolves. NL Add a *Final *Hunt to your Discard Pile. NL Exhaust.
dkSTS:SecondHunt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL dksts:Sic your dksts:Wolves. NL Add a *Final *Hunt+ to your Discard Pile. NL Exhaust.

dkSTS:FinalHunt.NAME: Final Hunt
dkSTS:FinalHunt.DESCRIPTION: dksts:Sic your dksts:Wolves !M! times, then dksts:Devour your dksts:Wolves. NL Enter dksts:Dire_Wolf. NL Exhaust.

dkSTS:FeedTheBeast.NAME: Feed the Beast
dkSTS:FeedTheBeast.DESCRIPTION: dksts:Devour your dksts:Wolves. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If you dksts:Devoured 10 dksts:Wolves, Transform into a dksts:Dire_Wolf. NL Exhaust.

dkSTS:FeralCharge.NAME: Feral Charge
dkSTS:FeralCharge.DESCRIPTION: dksts:Wild. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL dksts:Sic your dksts:Wolves, then dksts:Devour them. NL Exhaust.

dkSTS:MindlessStrike.NAME: Mindless Strike
dkSTS:MindlessStrike.DESCRIPTION: dksts:Wild. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust !M! card from your Discard Pile.
dkSTS:MindlessStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: dksts:Wild. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust !M! cards from your Discard Pile.

dkSTS:IllFate.NAME: Ill Fate
dkSTS:IllFate.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! dksts:Expose. NL dksts:Voidflux: Apply !M3! dksts:Expose. NL Exhaust.

dkSTS:Shillelagh.NAME: Shillelagh
dkSTS:Shillelagh.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL dksts:Flux: Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.

dkSTS:ShadowCloak.NAME: Shadowcloak
dkSTS:ShadowCloak.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add 1 *Void to your Discard Pile. NL dksts:Voidflux: Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.

dkSTS:AstralTendrils.NAME: Astral Tendrils
dkSTS:AstralTendrils.DESCRIPTION: At the start of every turn, take !M! damage. Whenever you take damage, add an *Echo *Tendril to your hand.

dkSTS:EchoTendril.NAME: Echo Tendril
dkSTS:EchoTendril.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL dksts:Voidflux: Apply !M! dksts:Expose. NL Exhaust.

dkSTS:RuneOfNull.NAME: Rune of Null
dkSTS:RuneOfNull.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL dksts:Hex: Enemy loses ALL Strength. NL dksts:Voidflux: Apply dksts:Hex to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
dkSTS:RuneOfNull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: dksts:Hex: Enemy loses ALL Strength. NL dksts:Voidflux: Apply dksts:Hex to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

dkSTS:Voidchill.NAME: Voidchill
dkSTS:Voidchill.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! dksts:Chill. NL Add a *Void to your Discard Pile.

dkSTS:GlyphOfForesight.NAME: Glyph of Foresight
dkSTS:GlyphOfForesight.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand and Exhaust it. NL At the start of your next turn, play it. NL Exhaust.
dkSTS:GlyphOfForesight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand and Exhaust it. NL At the start of your next turn, play it twice. NL Exhaust.

dkSTS:LupineMutagen.NAME: Lupine Mutagen
dkSTS:LupineMutagen.DESCRIPTION: Enter dksts:Dire_Wolf. NL When you exit dksts:Dire_Wolf, die.

dkSTS:EmbraceTheVoid.NAME: Embrace The Void
dkSTS:EmbraceTheVoid.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL You can always trigger dksts:Flux and dksts:Voidflux. NL At the start of your turn, lose 1 HP.

dkSTS:BloodPalimpsest.NAME: Blood Palimpsest
dkSTS:BloodPalimpsest.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP from a card, Discard and Upgrade this.
dkSTS:BloodPalimpsest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. dksts:Upgradable. NL When this card is Exhausted, dksts:Downgrade it. Gain !B! Block. Exhaust.

dkSTS:IcicleInferno.NAME: Shatter
dkSTS:IcicleInferno.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! dksts:Chill to ALL enemies. NL Add a *Burn to your Discard Pile.

dkSTS:BloodLance.NAME: Blood Lance
dkSTS:BloodLance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL dksts:Flux: dksts:Drain !H! HP.

dkSTS:Balance.NAME: Balance
dkSTS:Balance.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Gain !M3! dksts:Vitality. NL dksts:Flux: Gain !M! Dexterity. Lose !M2! Strength. NL dksts:Voidflux: Gain !M! Strength. Lose !M2! Dexterity.

dkSTS:MistyStep.NAME: Misty Step
dkSTS:MistyStep.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. dksts:Bonus. NL Prevent the next time you would lose HP this turn. NL End your turn.
dkSTS:MistyStep.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: dksts:Bonus. NL Prevent the next time you would lose HP this turn. NL End your turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Must be the second card played this turn...

dkSTS:DancingStars.NAME: Dancing Stars
dkSTS:DancingStars.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turns, Apply 1 dkSTS:Expose to a random enemy !M! times.

dkSTS:GlyphOfBeckoning.NAME: Glyph of Beckoning
dkSTS:GlyphOfBeckoning.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Next turn, dksts:Sic your Wolves.
dkSTS:GlyphOfBeckoning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. Next turn, dksts:Sic your Wolves twice.

dkSTS:EchoStrike.NAME: Echo Strike
dkSTS:EchoStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL dksts:Flux: Deal !D! damage. NL dksts:Voidflux: Deal !D! damage.
